programme.sub-title: S1 E6 S1 E6 Blinde Flecken
programme.desc: Created by Till Kleinert, Anna Stoeva. With Tristan Göbel, Charly Hübner, Alexander Scheer, Lilith Stangenberg. After his mother's death, 16-year-old Juri and his father Jaschek move into a run-down prefabricated building on the outskirts of the city. While Jaschek tries to build a new existence for himself and his son as the caretaker of the building, Juri gradually discovers that the house has a malicious life of its own and feeds on the suffering of its residents.

programme.desc: Created by Till Kleinert, Anna Stoeva. With Tristan Göbel, Charly Hübner, Alexander Scheer, Lilith Stangenberg. After his mother's death, 16-year-old Juri and his father Jaschek move into a run-down prefabricated building on the outskirts of the city. While Jaschek tries to build a new existence for himself and his son as the caretaker of the building, Juri gradually discovers that the house has a malicious life of its own and feeds on the suffering of its residents.

programme.desc: Created by Tom Kapinos. With Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside. Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.

programme.title: Histoire d'une bande à part
programme.desc: Révélé dans Babysitting en 2014, le comédien Philippe Lacheau mène une jolie carrière. Co-réalisateur de `Babysitting 2' en 2015, il a connu une belle année 2017, avec sa participation dans `Jour J' de Reem Kherici, mais surtout en réalisant son propre long métrage, `Alibi.com' sorti en salles en février puis en donnant la réplique à son complice Tarek Boudali dans `Epouse-moi mon pote', sorti en octobre.

programme.title: Sexes très opposés
Sexes très opposés
programme.desc: Directed by Eric Assous. With Charlotte de Turckheim, Patrick Chesnais, Elisa Tovati, Antoine Duléry. Ideally, a love affair should last a lifetime. programme.title: La dernière folie de Claire Darling
La dernière folie de Claire Darling
programme.desc: Directed by Julie Bertuccelli. With Catherine Deneuve, Chiara Mastroianni, Alice Taglioni, Laure Calamy. In Verderonne, a small village in the Oise, it's the first day of summer and Claire Darling wakes up convinced to live her last day - She then decides to empty her house and brade everything without distinction, Tiffany lamps to the collection clock. The objects so loved echo her tragic and flamboyant life. This last madness brings back Mary, her daughter, whom she has not seen for 20 years.
